articles.title: Congratulation from Russian President
articles.content:
Congratulation from Russian President
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory message from Russian President Dmitri Medvedev on Tuesday on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The message said:
					
					 Respected Your Excellency Chairman,
					
					 Please accept my heartfelt congratulations to you on your birthday.
					
					 I am convinced that the multifaceted relations between Russia and the DPRK based on the treaty of friendship, good neighborliness and cooperation concluded on Feb. 9, 2000, will in the future, too, develop in conformity with the interests of the two peoples and contribute to strengthening the stability and security in the Korean Peninsula and Northeast Asia.
					
					 Your Excellency Kim Jong Il,
					
					 I wish good health and success to you and peace and wellbeing to the Korean people.
					
					 With my regards.

articles.title: Floral Basket form Cambodian Great King
articles.content:
Floral Basket form Cambodian Great King
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Norodom Sihanouk, great king of Cambodia, sent a large floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh to congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his birthday.
					 Authorized by the great king, a delegation of the Ministry of the Royal Palace of the Cambodian government led by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace, visited the DPRK embassy on February 11 to lay the floral basket before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il there.

articles.title: Floral Basket form Cambodian King
articles.content:
Floral Basket form Cambodian King
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Norodom Sihamoni, king of Cambodia, sent a large floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh to congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his birthday.
					 Authorized by the king, a delegation of the Ministry of the Royal Palace of the Cambodian government led by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace, visited the DPRK embassy on February 11 to lay the floral basket before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il there.

articles.title: Floral Basket form Indonesian Party
articles.content:
Floral Basket form Indonesian Party
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Megawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, sent a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Jakarta on February 11 to congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his birthday.

articles.title: Gifts from Russian Party and Groups
articles.content:
Gifts from Russian Party and Groups
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with gifts by the chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity, the State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company and the "Orchestra of the 21st Century" of Russia on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The gifts were handed to the DPRK ambassador to Russia on Feb. 11 by Chairwoman of the Party S. Z. Umalatova, Director of the Company Elena Scherbakova and Head and Chief Conductor Pavel Ovsyannikov and Director Semyonova of the orchestra.

articles.title: Letter from Russian Charity Organization
articles.content:
Letter from Russian Charity Organization
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Feb. 12 received a letter from O. V. Oleinik, president of the Russian Federation of International Charity Organizations "World of Goodwill", carrying its decision on awarding Order of "Defender of Justice and Peace" to him.
					 The Federation awards this highest international order and a gold globe to Kim Jong Il, according to its Feb. 11, 2010, decision, the letter said, and continued:
					
					 We ask you to receive this order we present to you with boundless reverence in high recognition of your historic exploits performed for the noble cause of the development of education, science and culture, the education of young people in patriotism and morality, the promotion of people's well-being and goodwill and justice.
					
					 We are rejoiced over the fact that the friendly and cultural relations between the two countries are being strengthened with each passing day. 
					
					 The Monument to "Protectors of Arts for the Century", a common monument of international value, was erected in Pyongyang as the symbol of unbreakable friendship between the fraternal peoples of Russia and the DPRK by the cooperation we rendered out of good faith. 
					
					 We regard it as our pride to have inscribed the august name of most respected Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people, with gold letters on the Monument to "Good Natured Angels of Peace" erected in Moscow and have courteously registered his name on the "Golden Honorary Registration Book of All Nations", a valuable book distributed to all large libraries in regions and cities of Russia including the Russian State Library.
					
					 We hope that you would achieve glorious and fresh successes in your historic activities for the welfare of the Korean nation and the international community with your inexhaustible energy.
					
					 We wish the fraternal Korean people welfare, prosperity and peace, the letter said.

articles.title: Awarded by Russian Charity Organization
articles.content:
Awarded by Russian Charity Organization
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Russian Federation of International Charity Organizations "World of Goodwill" decided to confer Order of "Defender of Justice and Peace" to General Secretary Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his birthday.
					 O. V. Oleinik, president of the federation, handed over the letter on its decision to the DPRK ambassador to Russia on Feb. 12.

articles.title: Congratulation from AINDF
articles.content:
Congratulation from AINDF
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a congratulatory message by the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Tuesday, his birthday.
					 The message said:
					
					 Your birth as the bright star of Mt. Paektu amid grim anti-Japanese struggle, being blessed by the era, was the great fortune of the Korean nation that promised the eternal prosperity of Kim Il Sung's Korea and a great event of world historic significance that guaranteed the future of the human cause of independence.
					
					 Your revolutionary history represents the history of the noblest fidelity during which you have successfully translated into reality the great plan and desire of President Kim Il Sung who believed in people as in Heaven. It also represents the glorious chronicle of patriotism in which you have ushered in a new era of building a thriving nation with your distinguished political caliber and outstanding leadership.
					
					The DPRK has definitely assumed the status of a political, ideological and military power nobody dare provoke as it won one victory after another in the acute confrontation with the imperialists and the U.S. and in the struggle for defending socialism and became a legitimate nuclear weapons state. And it is making a general advance toward the eminence of an economic power amid the victorious drive to open the gate to a thriving nation. This reality brought by your leadership is a miracle to be specially recorded in the history of the nation spanning 5,000 years.
					
					 Under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself" we will resolutely frustrate the anti-reunification moves of the conservative ruling authorities going against the trend of the times and thus contribute to brilliantly glorifying 2010 as a year of opening a new phase for independent reunification.

articles.title: Congratulation from Chongryon
articles.content:
Congratulation from Chongryon
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory message from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Tuesday on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The message noted that under the leadership of Kim Jong Il the DPRK has demonstrated its might as a political and ideological power of single-minded unity the world is envious of, a military power with tremendous self-defense capability no formidable enemy dares to attack and a scientific and technological power which pushes back the frontiers of science in the world, and it is now coming close to a thriving socialist nation desired so ardently by President Kim Il Sung by dynamically advancing toward the final victory in the confrontation with the United States and the eminence of an economic power.
					
					 It referred to the fact that from the very day when he started his succession to the revolutionary cause of Juche, Kim Jong Il has taken warm care of Chongryon and the Korean residents in Japan as members of one family and shown all possible benevolent solicitude for them and wisely led Chongryon to display its honor as the pioneer of the overseas compatriots movement in the world in every stage of history.
					
					 It further said:
					
					 We, true to your noble idea and intention, will brilliantly adorn this year, which will see the 55th formation anniversary of Chongryon and the 22nd Congress of Chongryon, as a year of decisive turn in firmly laying the overall foundations for a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan in the new century and a year of leaping in further developing the patriotic movement centered on the work for national education.
					
					 We will actively join in the nationwide struggle to bring a new phase of the independent reunification of the country under the banner of "By our nation itself" and contribute to rejecting the Japanese authorities' hostile policy toward the DPRK and developing friendship between the peoples of the DPRK and Japan through enterprising external activities.

articles.title: Joint National Meeting of KCU Held
articles.content:
Joint National Meeting of KCU Held
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union organizations was held at the Taekwon-Do Hall on Tuesday to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Attending it were KCU delegates from provinces and KCU members in Pyongyang.
					
					 Present on invitation were Kim Jung Rin, Yang Hyong Sop and others, officials of party organs and the youth league, war veterans and persons of merit.
					
					 Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, in his report said that the birth of Kim Jong Il as the son of the guerrillas in Mt. Paektu, a holy mountain of revolution, was a great fortune of the nation. The Korean revolution could advance along the road of victory and glory under the banner of Songun with historic February, he added.
					
					 The KCU members are staunchly growing up to be reliable successors to the revolutionary cause of Songun and cultivating their hope and talents to the full under Kim Jong Il's loving care, the reporter said, stressing the need for all the KCU members to study hard and participate in the KCU organizational life in good faith and thus grow to be staunch reserves of the revolution who will accomplish the revolutionary cause of Songun generation after generation.
					
					 A ceremony for admission into the KCU took place at the meeting.
					
					 The pupils to join the KCU pledged an admission oath before the KCU flag.
					
					 Cadres, war veterans and persons of merit tied red neckerchiefs around the necks of newcomers into the KCU and pinned badges on their chests.
					
					 Then congratulatory speeches were made by war veteran Sin Hyo Sung, Prof. and Dr. Pak Ji Min of Kim Chaek University of Technology, and People's Sportswoman Sa Ok Jin.
					
					 They requested the new KCU members to firmly prepare themselves as the pillars to take on their shoulders the future of Songun Korea, cherishing the intense loyalty to Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Art Performances Given
articles.content:
Art Performances Given
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Art performances were given at theatres in Pyongyang and local areas on Tuesday to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The artistes of the State Symphony Orchestra put on the stage of concert at the Moranbong Theatre piano concerto "Song Devoted to Comrade Kim Jong Il", orchestras "General on a Galloping White Horse" and "Thunder over Jong Il Peak" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers highly praised the greatness of Kim Jong Il demonstrating the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's Korea.
					
					 The State Folk Art Troup gave an art performance at the Central Youth Hall and the artistes of the Orchestra of the Yun I Sang Music Institute a concert at the Yun I Sang Concert Hall.
					
					 The performers well presented the deep trust in Kim Jong Il and the fighting spirit of the Korean people working miracles and innovations in this year's general offensive with the same mental power as the former generation of the revolution displayed under his leadership.
					
					 Physical acrobat "Elastic Somersault", aerial stunt "Flying at Different Angles", animal feats "Bear's Jumping over Rope" and other acrobats were given at the Pyongyang Circus Theatre, delighting the citizens of Pyongyang who are spending the happy and joyful holiday.
					
					 Similar performances were also given at provincial art theatres on the same day.

articles.title: Youth and Student's Dancing Parties Held
articles.content:
Youth and Student's Dancing Parties Held
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place across the country on Feb. 16 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 In the dancing places in Pyongyang including the plazas of the Party Founding Memorial Tower, the Tower of the Juche Idea and the April 25 House of Culture, youth and students presented beautiful dance rhythms with the deep reverence for Kim Jong Il to the tune of "Bunches of Best Wishes to You", "Our General Is Best", "Let's Sing of Our Pride in Being under the Guidance of the General" and other songs.
					
					 The participants in the dancing parties expressed their firm determination to fully display the heroic stamina and courage of the Korean youth in the on-going general offensive campaign under the leadership of the Party, dancing to the tune of such songs as "Let's Become Army of General", "Let's Meet Each Other on the Front", "Let's Push Back the Frontiers of Science" and "Forward Higher and Faster".
					
					 Similar dancing parties were held in provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK in Festive Mood
articles.content:
DPRK in Festive Mood
						
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are celebrating the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il with heartfelt gratitude and respect for him, who has wisely guided the effort for the building of a thriving nation on the basis of invincible Songun politics, exalting the dignity and power of Kim Il Sung's Korea.
					 On this occasion diverse political events have taken place in Pyongyang and local areas. Among them are a national seminar on immortal leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il and meetings held in front of his old home in the Paektusan secret camp to vow loyalty to him.
					
					 Entering February an increasing number of people have visited the Paektusan secret camp and theaters throughout the country have been busy with art performances, celebration meetings, etc.
					
					 The 14th Kimjongilia Festival, the 19th International Figure Skating Festival for Paektusan Prize, a national photo exhibition, the 3rd National Pencil Drawing Festival and other functions are going on and people have enjoyed sports games and amusements, adding to the festive mood.
					
					 Streets and public and apartment buildings are adorned with lanterns with words "February 16" and "Celebration", posters and large-sized electric picture boards.

articles.title: Newspapers Observe Kim Jong Il's Birthday
articles.content:
Newspapers Observe Kim Jong Il's Birthday
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The leading newspapers of the DPRK today dedicate editorials to the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The half century-long history of Kim Jong Il's revolutionary activities is shining as glorious annals of the people's leader who has devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and the people's happiness, regarding it as his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 His revolutionary history is a sacred history of the people's father which would be unthinkable without the words "people" and an immortal history of the creator of the people's happiness who has done all he can do for them.
					
					 It is the greatest feat for the people that he has firmly defended and glorified Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses under the banner of Juche.
					
					 The genuine people's country where the people become the masters of everything and everything of society serves them, the country of single-minded unity in which all the people form a large family, holding the great leader in high esteem as their father and the promising society the members of which are making a leap forward toward the hopeful morrow full of high ambition and conviction--this is Korean-style socialism in which the people's long-cherished desire has come true.
					
					 His extraordinary strategy and plan provide a sure guarantee for the victory in the on-going grand drive for building a thriving nation to translate the people's ideals into reality.
					
					 It is the important mission and duty our generation has assumed for posterity and history to steadily glorify this shining heyday of Songun Korea, brought by him, with signal victory and successes of great surge and thereby translate into a brilliant reality President Kim Il Sung's desire for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The DPRK's cause of building a thriving nation is sure to emerge victorious as there are the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il guiding its army and people to a bright future in the new century, the single-minded unity of all the servicepersons and people rallied close around him and the powerful political and military strength and the solid foundations for self-supporting economy.
					
					 Minju Joson says that a very rosy future is in store for Songun Korea holding Kim Jong Il at the top of the revolution. And it calls upon all the Korean people to dynamically advance toward a thriving socialist nation with firm confidence in victory, rallied closer around him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Polish
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Polish
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Juzef Lachut, chairman of the National Executive Committee of the Polish Communist Party, issued a statement on Feb. 11 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Kim Jong Il is wisely leading the army and people of the DPRK with his original Songun revolutionary leadership, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 Great successes have recently been registered in different domains of the national economy including metal, electric power and coal industries and railway transport in the DPRK. The achievements gained by the Korean people in the economic construction are the fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who set forth the idea and line for turning the DPRK into an economic power in a short span of time and has led the drive for implement them.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun politics a turn has been brought about in the field of agriculture, the production of consumer goods for people increased and science and technology have been rapidly developed as required by the IT era.
					
					 Under his wise leadership the Korean people are sure to victoriously conclude the drive to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Ethiopians
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Ethiopians
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea issued the 6th issue of its bulletin under the headline of "Honorific Titles for Leader Kim Jong Il" on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The bulletin in an article said that Kim Jong Il enjoys boundless respect from the world people for his distinguished political caliber and outstanding personality as a great man.
					
					 Zimbabwean President Robert G. Mugabe, after being received by Kim Jong Il in 1980, praised him as a great man who inherited the noble traits of President Kim Il Sung, the bulletin noted, adding that for nearly 30 years since then Mugabe has paid deep attention to the publication, study and dissemination of Kim Jong Il's works, calling him "genius of ideology and theory" and "great master of leadership art".
					
					 Many people of the world laud him as "the great leader who ushered in the new history of the cause of perpetuating memory of Kim Il Sung", "the supreme personifier of revolutionary obligation", "dear and great common person", "the leader enjoying absolute support by the people", "hero born of Heaven", "man who embodies the Songun idea", "perfect strategist", "statesman of general type", "world political elder" and "the great leader who would steer the 21st century", it said.
					
					 Kim Jong Il who commands boundless respect and reverence from all people is a prominent great man in the present century, the bulletin stressed.

articles.title: February Holiday Marked in Russia and Turkey
articles.content:
February Holiday Marked in Russia and Turkey
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK book, photo, fine art and handicraft exhibitions were held in Russia and Turkey from Feb. 2 to 15 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed in the venues were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, books and photos on their Songun leadership exploits and fine art and handicraft pieces associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					  Speeches were made at their opening ceremonies.
					
					 The acting mayor of Artyom City and other figures of Russia expressed their best regards to Kim Jong Il on his birthday and praised the Korean people for having achieved marvelous successes in building a thriving nation under his leadership.
					
					 The deputy governor of Istanbul Province of Turkey said that the exhibition would provide the Turkish people with a good opportunity to get better understanding of the DPRK, and hoped that the relations between the two countries would develop in not only culture but also the economy and all other fields.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Turkey-Korea Friendship Association referred to the significance of the exhibition and expressed belief that the Korean people would achieve greater successes in building a thriving socialist nation, rallied close around Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Concert Given to Celebrate Lunar New Year
articles.content:
Concert Given to Celebrate Lunar New Year
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The concert of the Unhasu Orchestra for celebrating the lunar New Year is going on at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre before full house.
					  It was appreciated by state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and working people in the city on Tuesday.
					
					 Among the audience were congratulatory groups of overseas compatriots, overseas Koreans, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, diplomatic envoys of  different countries and representatives of international organizations here and foreign guests.
					
					 The repertoire of the concert included narration and music "The Night Seeing 2009 Out", mixed chorus "Let's Drink a Toast," female sextet and chorus "Greeting Spring on Jong Il Peak", male solo and chorus "Mt. Paektu, Cradle of Revolution".
					
					 The performers warmly praised the leadership feats of Kim Jong Il who brought about the great changes noteworthy in the history of building a thriving nation through his intensive forced march.
					
					 Female sextet "Yangsando", female solo "Beautiful Native Place", saxophone sextet "Song of Sliced Radish Kimchi" and other numbers made the audience replete with national emotion.
					
					 Female solo and chorus "Fly High, Chollima of Songun Korea", narration and music "Push Back the Frontiers of Science" and "Thriving Nation Is in Sight" and other numbers well represented the strong spirit of the Korean people dynamically advancing toward the hopeful future, in which the might of a thriving socialist nation is displayed, loudly singing the song of revolution and struggle.

articles.title: New Phase in Independent Reunification Called for
articles.content:
New Phase in Independent Reunification Called for
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration issued a statement on Feb. 12, calling for brilliantly decorating this year as a year of opening a new phase of independent reunification by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.
					 Since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, the reunification programme common to the nation, the Korean nation has ushered in the new era of reconciliation and unity, and the movement for national reunification has developed into the nation-wide movement involving all Koreans in the south and the north and overseas, the statement said, and continued:
					
					 The present conservative ruling forces of south Korea, however, have checked visits, contacts and multilateral cooperation between the south and the north while totally denying the joint declaration and suppressed pro-reunification movement organizations and escalated confrontation, tension and war crisis on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The prevailing grave reality compels the Korean compatriots to meet the challenge of anti-reunification forces and turn out in the more nationwide movement for national reunification.
					
					 The committee will invariably defend and implement the inter-Korean declarations, the banner of patriotism.
					
					 It will do its utmost to successfully hold the joint national event marking the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration as a nation-wide grand festival for reunification participated in by all political parties, organizations and figures of different strata in the south and the north and overseas, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de Medvedev
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de Medvedev
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje que le enviara el dia 16 el Presidente de la Federacion Rusa, D. Medvedev, para felicitarle su cumpleanos.
					La misiva senala:
					
					Su Excelencia estimado Presidente,
					
					Con motivo del cumpleanos de usted, hago llegarle mis sinceras felicitaciones.
					
					Estoy convencido de que las relaciones multilaterales entre Rusia y la RPDC, basadas en el Tratado sobre la Amistad, la Buena Vecindad y la Cooperacion, aprobado el 9 de febrero de 2000, se desarrollaran tambien en el futuro conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de los dos paises y contribuiran a fortalecer la estabilidad y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region del Noreste Asiatico.
					
					Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il,
					
					Le deseo a usted buena salud y exitos en su trabajo, y al pueblo coreano la paz y bienestar.
					
					Con alta consideracion.

articles.title: Norodom Sihanouk envia cesto de flores a la embajada coreana
articles.content:
Norodom Sihanouk envia cesto de flores a la embajada coreana
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento (16 de febrero) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el gran rey de Camboya, Norodom Sihanouk, hizo llegar un gran cesto de flores a la embajada coreana en su pais.
					Por encargo del gran rey, la delegacion del Ministerio del Palacio Real del gobierno del Reino de Camboya presidida por el vicepremier encargado de este Palacio, Kong Sam Ol, visito el dia 11 la embajada coreana y lo coloco ante los retratos del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente.

articles.title: Rey de Camboya envia cesto de flores a la embajada coreana
articles.content:
Rey de Camboya envia cesto de flores a la embajada coreana 
						
ia de nacimiento (16 de febrero) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el rey de Camboya, Norodom Sihamoni, hizo llegar un gran cesto de flores a la embajada coreana en su pais.
					Por encargo del rey, la delegacion del Ministerio del Palacio Real del gobierno del Reino de Camboya encabezada por el vicepremier encargado de este Palacio, Kong Sam Ol, visito el dia 11 la embajada coreana y lo coloco al pie de los retratos del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe orden de una entidad rusa
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe orden de una entidad rusa
						
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ATCC) -- La Federacion Internacional de las Entidades de Caridad de Rusia "Mundo de Buena Voluntad" decidio otorgar al Dirigente Kim Jong Il la orden "Defensor de  justicia y paz" con motivo de su cumpleanos (16 de febrero).
					El presidente de esa entidad, O. V. Oleinik, entrego el dia 12 la carta sobre tal decision al embajador coreano en Rusia.

articles.title: Periodicos conmemoran el cumpleanos de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Periodicos conmemoran el cumpleanos de Kim Jong Il
						
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ATCC) -- Los periodicos capitalinos difundieron en sus ediciones del dia 16 los editoriales dedicados al dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					El medio siglo de las actividades revolucionarias del Dirigente Kim Jong Il brilla como gloriosos anales de este lider popular quien dedico todo lo suyo para la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo tomando el ideario Iminwichon (considerar al pueblo como el cielo) como su maxima de vida, senala el rotativo Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					De veras, la historia revolucionaria del Dirigente es la sagrada del padre del pueblo que no se puede concebir sin la palabra "pueblo" y la imborrable del creador de la felicidad del pueblo que hizo todo lo posible para este.
					
					La maxima hazana que realizo el por el pueblo es haber defendido firmemente y glorificado bajo la bandera de la idea Juche el socialismo al estilo coreano centrado en las masas populares.
					
					Este modelo social, que satisfizo los deseos seculares del pueblo, es precisamente el autentico pais del pueblo donde este es dueno de lo todo y todas las cosas de la sociedad estan a su servicio, el pais de la unidad monolitica en que todo el pueblo forma un familion teniendo a su gran Dirigente como padre y la sociedad prometedora que avanza hacia el futuro esperanzador con gran aspiracion y fe.
					
					Gracias a la extraordinaria estrategia y proposito del Dirigente, esta asegurada la victoria de la gran empresa de hoy de construir una gran potencia prospera encaminada a realizar los ideales del pueblo.
					
					Poner en practica el deseo del Presidente         Kim Il Sung de construir una gran potencia prospera coronando con grandes victorias y exitos del gran auge la epoca dorada de la Corea del Songun iniciada por el Dirigente es la importante mision y deber de nuestra generacion asumidos ante las posteridades y la historia.
					
					Es definitiva la victoria de nuestra causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera gracias a la sabia guia del Dirigente, quien conduce al ejercito y al pueblo al esplendido futuro del nuevo siglo, a la unidad monolitica de todos los militares y civiles en torno a el y al gran poderio politico-militar y solida base de la economia autarquica.
					
					El periodico Minju Joson subraya en su editorial que se abre un horizonte amplio y prometedor ante el camino de la Corea del Songun que tiene al Dirigente al frente de la revolucion. 
					
					Llama a todos a luchar dinamicamente, unidos mas compactamente en torno al Dirigente, por edificar una gran potencia prospera socialista con gran fe en la victoria.
